ThingDef.label: muffalo genetic material
ThingDef.description: Muffalo genetic material, when combind with humanoid genetic material and a stabaliser can augment a subject with aditional strength and cold resistance. Possible Augments: (assuming subject has fully adapted over time) -Spine - Manipulation +25% - Comfy Temp -10 -Legs - Manipulation +1% - Comfy Temp -5 - Movement +3% -Arms - Manipulation +1% - Comfy Temp -5 - Melee Weapon damage +7%
